newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Australian Stocks to Watch Today - May 9.
newsitem.headline: Australian Stocks to Watch Today - May 9.

text.p: Some Australian stocks to watch this morning:
*The Broken Hill Pty Co Ltd A$17.83 (-0.25)
Market leader announced plans after Thursday's close to issue A$636 million worth of shares. The funds raised would be used to help shareholders to buy additional small parcels.
Market still digests Thursday's release of Rupert Murdoch's media empire sharp rise in third quarter profit, which was boosted by strong U.S. film and television performances.
Insurer to hold annual meeting today. The group may comment on current year outlook.
Major shareholder Bank of Scotland Plc raises stake in Perth-based bank after Thursday's close.
